citations.narrative:
** The last verified visit to the facility was on 01-16-2021. The attending veterinarian must visit the premises not less than
once every 12 months. The Program of Veterinary Care also stated that all adult dogs would be examined during the site
visit once every 12 months. The licensee must schedule a site visit by the attending veterinarian to include a head to tail
examination for all adult dogs. This is to ensure adequate veterinary care and to provide for the health and well-being of
the animals.
To be corrected by: 05-17-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.

narrative:
3.13(a)(1) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
** The last verified visit to the facility was on 01-16-2021. The attending veterinarian must visit the premises not less than 
once every 12 months. The Program of Veterinary Care also stated that all adult dogs would be examined during the site 
visit once every 12 months. The licensee must schedule a site visit by the attending veterinarian to include a head to tail 
examination for all adult dogs. This is to ensure adequate veterinary care and to provide for the health and well-being of 
the animals. 
To be corrected by: 05-17-2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
